Journal Story: The time seems right for a big adventure and extreme change of scenery. When the time comes you will know it. You just have to figure out the details. It may be a thru hike, it may be a flip-flop, it may be done over two or three consecutive years. All that needs to be decided and this is the first step.
Trying to figure out how to make a journal entry might be challenging in itself!

The allure of hiking the AT is growing stronger all the time. The more i read about it, the more I feel myself being pulled in that direction. Life is too short and there is way too much to do! Hiking the AT would be good for body & soul!

Forgot to mention that I want to communicate with other people thinking of hiking the AT in 2017. Also words of encouragement from any and all would be appreciated! For you folks hiking now - may all your expectations be met and be fufilling. For you past AT hikers, I admire & respect you all for doing what you needed or wanted to do! Gotta chase the dream!
